REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1772 reute r f BC-HUBCO-<HCO>-TO-SEEK-N 03-19 0041

TEXT.TITLE: HUBCO <HCO> TO SEEK N.Y. LOAN OFFICE
TEXT.BODY: Hubco Inc said its board is in the process of filing an application with the New York State Banking Department to permit the formation of a loan production office in that state. Reuter
